# GPT-4 tokenizer 

## Contents
- `cl100k_base.tiktoken`
- `config.json`
- `tokenizer.json`

## Sources
- `cl100k_base.tiktoken`:  
  https://openaipublic.blob.core.windows.net/encodings/cl100k_base.tiktoken
- `tokenizer.json`:  
  https://huggingface.co/Xenova/gpt-4/tree/main
